item.title: Cosplaying as a webdev with Claude Code in January 2026
item.description:

item.title: Reflections of a Developer on LLMs in January 2026
item.description:
Funnily enough, Charles Dickens was talking about late 18th century Europe rather than the state of AI and LLMs in 2026, but here goes:

It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness, it was the epoch of belief, it was the epoch of incredulity, it was the season of light, it was the season of darkness, it was the spring of hope, it was the winter of despair.
